mods.abstract: RUNAWAY OR STOLEN FROM the plantation of J. P. SUTTON, in Lafayette county, Ark., on the 9th inst., a negro man named ALECK, aged about 23 years, of black complexion, about 5 feet, 9 inches in height, weighs about 145 pounds, stout built, inclined to be round shouldered, thick lips, a good negro fidler. Had on when he left a yellowish green pair of pants, old kersey coat and white hat. I will pay a liberal reward for the boy Aleck being lodged in any jail where I can get him; or for any evidence that will convict the thief. RUTH McKNIGHT, Randolph, Arkansas. Address: j29-4t*
